mentions.tacticalSituation: In many areas it’s a two horse race between the Lib Dems and Labour. In many parts of Britain, the Conservatives can’t win and are in a poor third place. In areas like this, the only way to get real change is to vote Liberal Democrat. Voting Conservative could just help Labour win again. The choice on election day will be between Liberal Democrats and Labour.

images.caption: In many areas it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and Labour
